channel.title: Best heavy metal album of all time
channel.description:
[img]http://bloodstreets.files.wordpress.com/2008/04/thundersteel-fronter.jpg[/img]
Riot - Thundersteel
Seriously, this album is so fucking great i listen it through every single day.
Here's some great song-picks from it:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nZUysqemMmg - Thundersteel http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6B-2HXf4SkQ - Bloodstreets (best ballad of all time) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nPMCcc54w3s - Flight of the warrior http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X9aAddtT8PA - Fight or fall

[quote=“Original Daniel, post:2, topic:284332”]i like it, surprised i hadn’t heard of them before[/quote]Probably because they were on an indie label already back in the 80’s. They never got particularily big even though they released 14 studio albums or something like that
